directions: Mix red onion, mango, jalapeno pepper, tomatoes, and garlic together in a large bowl. Stir lime juice and vinegar together in a small bowl, drizzle over onion mixture, and mix to coat; season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon salt, or more to taste
1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or more to taste
title: Spicy Sweet Salsa
